description:
The reunited members of Code Zero plan their next move. Meanwhile, Aoi convinces Defrott to return to the stage for a charity performance. But will any of them be prepared for Rufus`s latest scheme?
Source: Funimation

titles.title: A Midsummer Night`s Dream Gone By
Toorisugishi, Natsu no Yoru no Yume
通り過ぎし, 夏の夜の夢
